summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Community Development Block Grant Float Loan Program; authorizing a short-term loan of up to One Million Four Hundred Thousand Dollars ($ 1,400,000) in federal Block Grant funds to Central Coop for costs of the leasehold improvements and related costs of developing a 15,000 square foot store at 1616 Madison Street; authorizing related agreements and amendment of the Consolidated Plan; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
